Hello !

The war in Ukraine has affected each Ukrainian and a lot of people around the globe. At the moment the war is being actively waged and is in the hot phase, but when Ukraine wins, a new stage will begin - the stage of restoration of the country.
Ukrainian zoos are in severe need of help now and will be in need after the war ends. There are no visitors in the zoos, which results in no budgeting.
Your generous donations can save many lives!
